We officially welcome the Dog Days of Summer! 😂 🐶 Have you flown Allegiant with your furry friend? Share your favorite photo by tagging us and using #TogetherWeFly 

📸: @mrsbonesy on Instagram https://t.co/1dSKIYY3XC

Slide into summer savings with today's deals: https://t.co/U6l1hMEQLe

#TogetherWeFly #TravelDeals https://t.co/HYgSVkqme5

Reunions are kind of our thing and this one might be our favorite reunion yet. So very glad we could reunite Natalie and her special friend Jailoh 🐕 at @flyavlnow.

Read the full story from @WLOS_13 here: https://t.co/NwbtNIVP1Z 

#TogetherWeFly #Reunited

urls.title: These are the 50 best places to travel to in 2019
urls.description: Need vacation ideas for 2019? The 50 vacation destinations Travel + Leisure has ranked as the best include new capitals of culture, idyllic remote islands, tourism destinations that are back in fighting form after natural disasters or human conflict — and much, much more.

data.text: @Bergs_roomh Hello Charles, We are sorry to hear of your experience. Can you advise your flight number so we can take a look at the details. Ticket counters do open 2 hours prior to departure time at all our locations for check in. -Bree

Family is important to you & because of that, it's important to us. Our ultra-low-cost, nonstop flights mean more QT with those you love.

We love being a part of Suzanne's story - let us be a part of yours. Start your story today, only at https://t.co/3S2HwAZh2E.

#TogetherWeFly https://t.co/q6UGEdFEVa

data.text:
Meet Vincent and Harry, a father-son duo who fly as co-pilots.

"We shared the cockpit when he taught me to fly. Now, 13 years later, we share it at the same airline," says Vincent. 

We know the bond they share is something special. Happy #FathersDay from all of us at Allegiant! https://t.co/U3CwM72uiv

data.text:
Tomorrow may be Father's Day, but today we're celebrating one of our favorite things about dads - the Dad Joke. We have heard some good ones, but this one may just be our favorite. 

Share your favorite Dad Joke with us in honor of #FathersDay tomorrow. #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/c55eXHlze0
